title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Mix eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Drain pasta, add pancetta and egg mixture off heat.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Sauté onion and garlic in butter.
Add tomato puree and cook for 5 minutes.
Stir in cream and chicken, simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Crispy bread topped with creamy avocado, perfect for breakfast or brunch.
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden.
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread avocado mix on toast.
Sprinkle chili flakes if desired and serve.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Fresh romaine lettuce with parmesan, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce.
Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Add parmesan and croutons.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple yet delicious pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Preheat oven to 250°C (480°F).
Spread tomato sauce on rolled-out dough.
Add mozzarella slices and basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Bake for 8-10 minutes until golden.

title: Beef Burger
summary: Juicy grilled beef patty served with lettuce, cheese, and sauce in a toasted bun.
instructions: Season beef patty with salt and pepper.
Grill until cooked to preference.
Toast buns lightly.
Assemble with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and sauce.

title: Pancakes with Syrup
summary: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and butter.
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder in a bowl.
Whisk in egg and milk until smooth.
Cook batter on greased pan until bubbles form.
Flip and cook until golden.
Serve with butter and syrup.

title: Sushi Platter
summary: An assortment of fresh sushi rolls and sashimi.
instructions: Cook sushi rice and season with vinegar mix.
Place rice on nori sheet, add fillings.
Roll tightly and slice.
Serve with sashimi, soy sauce, and wasabi.

title: Grilled Salmon
summary: Perfectly grilled salmon fillet served with lemon and herbs.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Brush salmon with olive oil, season with salt and pepper.
Grill for 4-5 minutes per side.
Serve with lemon wedges and dill.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy frosting.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk eggs, milk, and melted butter separately.
Combine and pour into greased tin.
Bake for 30-35 minutes, frost if desired.

title: Greek Salad
summary: A refreshing salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, feta cheese, and olive oil.
instructions: Combine tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and olives in a large bowl.
Add feta cheese on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper, then toss gently before serving.

title: French Fries
summary: Crispy golden fries served with ketchup or mayo.
instructions: Peel and cut potatoes into thin strips.
Soak in cold water for 30 minutes, then drain and pat dry.
Heat oil in a deep fryer or large pot.
Fry potatoes until golden brown and crispy.
Drain on paper towels, season with salt, and serve with ketchup or mayo.

title: Lobster Roll
summary: Succulent lobster meat in a buttery toasted roll.
instructions: Mix lobster meat with mayonnaise, lemon juice, and chives.
Butter the hot dog buns and toast until golden.
Fill buns with lobster mixture and serve immediately.

title: Tacos al Pastor
summary: Mexican tacos with marinated pork, pineapple, and onions.
instructions: Marinate pork in pineapple juice, chili powder, and vinegar for at least 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry pork until cooked.
Warm tortillas and fill with pork, pineapple, and onions.
Serve hot.

title: Mushroom Risotto
summary: Creamy risotto with sautéed mushrooms and parmesan.
instructions: Sauté onions in butter until soft.
Add mushrooms and cook until tender.
Add rice and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Gradually add broth, stirring constantly, until rice is creamy and cooked.
Stir in parmesan cheese before serving.

title: Blueberry Muffins
summary: Soft muffins bursting with fresh blueberries.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
In another bowl, whisk milk, butter, and eggs.
Combine wet and dry ingredients, then fold in blueberries.
Pour into muffin tin and bake for 20-25 minutes.

title: Steak with Vegetables
summary: Grilled steak served with seasonal vegetables and mashed potatoes.
instructions: Season steaks with salt, pepper, and olive oil.
Grill steaks to desired doneness.
Steam or sauté vegetables.
Serve steaks with vegetables and mashed potatoes.

title: Ice Cream Sundae
summary: Vanilla ice cream topped with chocolate syrup, whipped cream, and a cherry.
instructions: Place ice cream in a bowl or sundae glass.
Drizzle chocolate syrup over ice cream.
Top with whipped cream and cherry.
Serve immediately.

title: Pad Thai
summary: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, eggs, peanuts, and bean sprouts.
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened.
Stir-fry shrimp until cooked, then add eggs and scramble.
Add noodles, soy sauce, and fish sauce.
Toss in bean sprouts and peanuts before serving.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A mix of colorful vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell pepper, carrots)
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok or pan.
Add garlic and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add vegetables and cook until tender-crisp.
Stir in soy sauce and serve hot.
